title: Including me. Parts I and II
creator_contributor_role: Indiana University. Audio Visual Center, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped children
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped children - Education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped children - Development
description: Part I documents some of the problems encountered by handicapped individuals and explains how recent Federal legislation can help them find school programs appropriate to their needs. Part II focuses on four handicapped individuals who have succeeded in making progress in educational settings.
